q: results for Wall Street. Eric Schmidt , who was named chairman in March 2001 and CEO the following August, said he'll now focus on where he can add`` the greatest value''. Externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach; and internally as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin , he said target="_blank" href="http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/01/update-from-chairman.html"> here. Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
